name: table_schema_specs_for_level_0_c2m2_encoding_of_dcc_metadata
title: A complete list of schematic specifications for the resources (TSV table files) that will be used to represent C2M2 Level 0 DCC metadata prior to ingest into the C2M2 database system.

fields.name: id_namespace
fields.description: String identifier assigned by CFDE to the DCC managing this file. The value of this field will be used together with id (assigned to each file by the DCC that owns it) as a paired-key structure formally identifying Level 0 file entities within the total C2M2 data space.

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unrestricted-format string identifying this file, assigned by the DCC managing it. Can be any string as long as it uniquely identifies each file within the scope of a single Level 0 metadata submission.

fields.name: persistent_id
fields.description: A persistent, resolvable URI generated by a DCC and permanently attached to this file, to serve as a permanent address to which landing pages and other relevant decorations can eventually be attached to this file, including (optionally) resolution to a network location from which the file can be downloaded. Actual network locations MUST NOT be embedded directly within this identifier.

fields.name: size_in_bytes
fields.description: The size of a file in bytes.

fields.name: sha256
fields.description: The output of the SHA-256 cryptographic hash function after being run on this file. One or both of sha256 and md5 is required. sha256 is preferred.

fields.name: md5
fields.description: The output of the MD5 message-digest algorithm after being run as a cryptographic hash function on this file. One or both of sha256 and md5 is required. sha256 is preferred.

fields.name: filename
fields.description: A filename with no prepended PATH information.

resources.name: id_namespace
resources.title: id_namespace
resources.description: INTERNAL CV: Dictionary of CFDE-generated identifier namespaces corresponding to top-level C2M2 metadatasets

fields.name: id
fields.description: A globally unique ID representing this identifier namespace

fields.name: abbreviation
fields.description: A very short display label for this identifier namespace

fields.name: name
fields.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this identifier namespace

fields.name: description
fields.description: A human-readable description of this identifier namespace
